content: Revenue was $105.2 million, a 17% increase over Q1 of last year, and represented our 85th consecutive quarter of revenue growth. The total number of recurring revenue customers increased 12% year-over-year to approximately $37,900, and wallet share increased 5% to $10,350. For the quarter, adjusted EBITDA grew 25% to $31.8 million compared to $25.5 million in Q1 of last year. For the full year, we expect revenue to be in the range of $443.4 million to $445.9 million, representing approximately 15% to 16% growth over 2021.
